dockbar.cxx

00001 #include "dockbar.hpp"
00002 #include "ui/dockbutton.hpp"
00003 #include "ui/dockwidget.hpp"
00004 #include "private/dockbar_p.hpp"
00005 #include <QtGui/QAction>
00006 #include <QtCore/QSignalMapper>
00007 using namespace Aki;
00008 
00009 DockBar::DockBar(QWidget* parent)
00010     : KToolBar(parent)
00011 {
00012     _d.reset(new Aki::DockBarPrivate(this));
00013     _d->showDockMapper = new QSignalMapper(this);
00014     _d->hideDockMapper = new QSignalMapper(this);
00015 
00016      connect(_d->showDockMapper, SIGNAL(mapped(QWidget*)),
00017              _d.data(), SLOT(dockShow(QWidget*)));
00018      connect(_d->hideDockMapper, SIGNAL(mapped(QWidget*)),
00019              _d.data(), SLOT(dockHide(QWidget*)));
00020 
00021     setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::NoContextMenu);
00022     setToolBarsEditable(false);
00023     setToolBarsLocked(true);
00024     setFloatable(false);
00025     setMovable(false);
00026     setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
00027 }
00028 
00029 DockBar::~DockBar()
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00033 void
00034 DockBar::addDock(Aki::DockWidget* dock)
00035 {
00036     if (!dock) {
00037         return;
00038     }
00039 
00040     Aki::DockButton* button = new Aki::DockButton(this);
00041     button->setDock(dock);
00042     button->setAutoHide(true);
00043     dock->setDockBar(this);
00044     dock->hide();
00045     _d->createAction(button);
00046 
00047     connect(button, SIGNAL(triggered(QAction*)),
00048             _d.data(), SLOT(buttonTriggered(QAction*)));
00049     connect(button, SIGNAL(mouseLeave()),
00050             _d->hideDockMapper, SLOT(map()));
00051     connect(dock, SIGNAL(dockAutoHideStateChanged(bool)),
00052             _d.data(), SLOT(dockAutoHideStateChanged(bool)));
00053 
00054     _d->showDockMapper->setMapping(button, dock);
00055     _d->hideDockMapper->setMapping(button, dock);
00056 
00057     if (area() == Qt::LeftToolBarArea || area() == Qt::RightToolBarArea) {
00058         button->setOrientation(Qt::Vertical);
00059     } else {
00060         button->setOrientation(Qt::Horizontal);
00061     }
00062 
00063     emit dockAdded(button->dock());
00064 }
00065 
00066 Qt::ToolBarAreas
00067 DockBar::area() const
00068 {
00069     return allowedAreas();
00070 }
00071 
00072 Aki::DockButton*
00073 DockBar::buttonForAction(QAction* action)
00074 {
00075     return qobject_cast<Aki::DockButton*>(widgetForAction(action));
00076 }
00077 
00078 Aki::DockButton*
00079 DockBar::buttonForDock(Aki::DockWidget* dock)
00080 {
00081     QList<QAction*> al = actions();
00082     foreach (QAction* action, al) {
00083         Aki::DockButton* button = buttonForAction(action);
00084         if (button && button->dock() == dock) {
00085             return button;
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00089     return 0;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void
00093 DockBar::removeDock(Aki::DockWidget* dock)
00094 {
00095     Q_UNUSED(dock);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void
00099 DockBar::setDockArea(Qt::ToolBarArea area)
00100 {
00101     setAllowedAreas(area);
00102 }
